word: H7823 - שָׁחִיס - shâchîyç - shaw-khece' - Which springeth of the same

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Which springeth of the same
volunteer grain; grain that shoots up of itself the second year, without replanting
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root apparently meaning to sprout; after growth: - (that) which springeth of the same.
Cognate: H5500, H5501, H7823
